title: Contacting team members
body:
It would be nice if team members could email each other to arrange times to play.  I am finding that waiting for every team member to be online to arrange a game  next to useless.  Can you consider adding a message system that privately emails teams or leaves a message that all can see when next on and reply to?

This would make having a team worthwhile as we could schedule games and know that all will be able to participate.  Its all about the comms.

replies.body:
Solid idea, but you could probably do this yourself if you knew each of them individually.

You can also have more than four other members to a team, so that if one is absent, you can still play games anyway.
